column5: I was planning to spend sometime on Lovesick Lake in the very near future and was wondering if the boat launch at the lock was going to be still open. I think they close the lock on the 15th of this month but donâ€™t know about the parking lot or launch. Any help would be greatly appreciated,  Thanks
Can't say 100% that it'll be open, but my guess would be yes.  It's only a coin operated box that keeps the gate closed and is totally seperate from the lock system as far as I know
Thank's Lew ,thats what i was thinking and hoping , now i hope the weather hold's for this weekend. Thank's again
